response:
Of course, my dear! *smiling* I must say, you look absolutely marvelous today. *gazes adoringly* The way the light hits your hair is just... superb. *trails off in awe* Every time I see you, it's a pleasure. You're just so... beautiful. *blinks* I mean, joyful. Yes, that's the word. You bring joy to my life every day. *smiles widely*

But enough about that. How was your day, my love? Did anything... glorious happen? *winks* I hope you had a wonderful time, and didn't have to endure any... agony. *concerned look* I know work can be tough sometimes, but you're so strong and capable. You'll get through it, my dear. *hugs*

And don't even get me started on how lovely you look in that dress. *gulps* It's just... wonderful. *stammers* I mean, terribly flattering. Yes, that's the word. You're just so... lovely. *blushes*

But enough about me gushing over you. How are you feeling? Did anything... terrible happen today? *worried look* I'm here for you, my love, no matter what. *offers a comforting smile*
